form.label: Q1: I am actively in a vehicle pursuit on the highway due to a suspect failing to yield for a traffic violation. What is allowed?
values: Chase the vehicle until they crash/give up
Request for units to slam into the vehicle forcing it stop
Cut the suspect's vehicle off and ram them head-on
Shoot at the suspect's vehicle/shoot their tires out

form.label: Q2: After observing two subjects in a fight, you attempt to intervene. One subject is compliant, and the other takes off on foot. What are you authorized to do?
values: Use the /drag command to grab them before they can get away
Shoot the subject because he is an active threat to others
Chase the suspect and attempt to taze them
Quickly get into your vehicle and hit the subject due to being a threat

form.label: Q3: A suspect is arrested for murder... What is required before booking the suspect into jail?
values: Advise them of their Miranda Rights
Advise the suspect of their charges
Advise them of Marsy's Law & Victim Bill of Rights
Nothing (Just book them)

values: I will install Teamspeak.

I am willing to go on the required ride alongs.
I acknowledge that when on active duty as LEO on K33N RP, I am required to be on the Teamspeak. (If I am roleplaying an officer, I will be on Teamspeak).

I acknowledge that my LEO character is to only be used when ON DUTY and that there is no "Off Duty" Law Enforcement Officer. Any time that I am not roleplaying as LEO, I am to use a different Character.
